gen:link.msg:message: The total of `ConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability` reported with `ConstructionContractsAxis` SHOULD be equal to `ConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability` without `ConstructionContractsAxis`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetTConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetTConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetNTConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST1SumFactsTypedEQFactNonTyped2_SetNTConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ConstructionContractsAmountRecordedAsLiability` SHOULD be equal to + `ConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST101Variable1_ConstructionContractsAmountRecordedAsLiability')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST101Variable1_ConstructionContractsAmountRecordedAsLiability return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST101Variable1_ConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedCurrentLiabilitiesConstructionContractsSpecification_PrtFST101Variable1_ConstructionContractsLiabilitiesRecordedAsLiability return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
